result.reason: The issue is a feature request with stale context and no current-version, reproducible requirements for what connection synchronization should do, so it is not actionable yet.
result.approach: Ask the reporter to retest on v1.79.x and provide precise sync scope, workflow, and expected conflict-resolution behavior, then re-triage.
